abnormality.name: Substantial Enchantment Blessing
abnormality.tooltip: Your enchantment chance is substantially increased. Applies to items of all tiers, but only up to enchantment level +12.

abnormality.name: Greater Enchantment Blessing
abnormality.tooltip: Your enchantment chance is greatly increased. Applies to items of all tiers, but only up to enchantment level +12.

abnormality.name: Massive Enchantment Blessing
abnormality.tooltip: Your enchantment chance is massively increased. Applies to items of all tiers, but only up to enchantment level +12.

abnormality.name: Complete Crystalbind
abnormality.tooltip: A protective spell which protects all crystals from destruction as long as you are a TERA Club member.

abnormality.name: Crafting Expert (TERA Club)
abnormality.tooltip: Increases the speed of crafting all equipment by $H_W_GOOD$value$COLOR_END as long as you are a TERA Club member.

abnormality.name: Significant Crafting Time Reduction
abnormality.tooltip: Significantly decreases your crafting time.

abnormality.name: Darkan's Wings
abnormality.tooltip: Gives you burning wings.<BR>The effect disappears if you are hit or inflict damage.

abnormality.name: Lethal Intent
abnormality.tooltip: Shrouds you in the sinister mists of ferocious battles.

abnormality.name: Divine Judgment
abnormality.tooltip: Godlike powers course through your veins.

abnormality.name: Titanic Power
abnormality.tooltip: Your body pulsates with the energy of the titans and increases in size. Can be stacked up to 3 times in total.

abnormality.name: Ice Whisper
abnormality.tooltip: Increases your skill damage by 5%, reduces your movement speed by 10% and grants you a shield which can absorb up to 75,000 damage.<BR>Shields your body in ice.

abnormality.name: Fiery Fervor
abnormality.tooltip: Increases your attack speed by 5% and reduces your health by 75%. Healing you receive is reduced by 85%.<BR>Bathes your body in fire.

abnormality.name: Item XP +5%
abnormality.tooltip: Increases item XP earned through Vanguard Initiative quests by 5%.<br><font color = '#FF0000'>Time also counts when you are offline.</font>

abnormality.name: Combat Accelerator Potion
abnormality.tooltip: Increases your skill damage by 12.5% for 30 minutes.

abnormality.name: Lamb Bulgogi
abnormality.tooltip: Raises maximum HP by $H_W_GOOD$value$COLOR_END, Crit Factor by $H_W_GOOD$value2$COLOR_END, and Attack Speed by $H_W_GOOD$value3$COLOR_END.

abnormality.name: Feast
abnormality.tooltip: A feast consisting of Lamb Bulgogi, Large Freeholds Flame Salad, Traditional Bleakfields BBQ, and Bleak Wings.$BR$BRIncreases healing effects of buffs by $H_W_GOOD$value5$COLOR_END.$BRReplenishes $H_W_GOOD1%$COLOR_END of your maximum MP every $H_W_GOOD$tickInterval3$COLOR_END.$BRRaises max HP by $H_W_GOOD$value$COLOR_END.$BRRaises max MP by $H_W_GOOD$value2$COLOR_END.$BRIncreases Crit Resist Factor by $H_W_GOOD$value4$COLOR_END.$BRIncreases Crit Factor by $H_W_GOOD$value6$COLOR_END.$BRIncrease Attack Speed by $H_W_GOOD$value7$COLOR_END.

abnormality.name: Liquid Mirage
abnormality.tooltip: Increases the chance of loot. If all party members benefit from the effect, the loot will be doubled.

abnormality.name: Item XP +20%
abnormality.tooltip: Increases Item XP earned by 20%.

abnormality.name: Exollusion
abnormality.tooltip: Increases the chance of loot by 20%. This effect disappears if you leave Exodor or enter a dungeon.

abnormality.name: Lethal Intent
abnormality.tooltip: Shrouds you in the sinister mists of ferocious battles.

abnormality.name: Divine Judgment
abnormality.tooltip: Godlike powers course through your veins. The effect is purely cosmetic.

abnormality.name: Elemagnetic Bait
abnormality.tooltip: You can catch sharks that have swallowed Elemental Cores or Fragments.

abnormality.name: Emblem of Eminence
abnormality.tooltip: Provides the following effects.$BR $BRIncreases $H_W_GOOD1%$COLOR_END of total HP every second.$BRIncreases the drop rate when hunting monsters by $H_W_GOOD100%$COLOR_END (drop rate is influenced by the number of party members)

abnormality.name: Glorious Memento
abnormality.tooltip: Provides the following effects.$BR $BR Increases total HP by $H_W_GOOD7%$COLOR_END$BR Increases endurance by $H_W_GOOD20%$COLOR_END$BR Increases attack speed by $H_W_GOOD15%$COLOR_END$BR Increases skill damage by $H_W_GOOD20%$COLOR_END$BR Prevents crystals from breaking $H_W_GOOD1$COLOR_END time

abnormality.name: Seal of the Undying Flame
abnormality.tooltip: Provides the following effects.$BR $BRIncreases total HP by $H_W_GOOD7%$COLOR_END$BR Increases endurance by $H_W_GOOD20%$COLOR_END$BRIncreases Movement Speed in combat by $H_W_GOOD10$COLOR_END$BRIncreases attack speed by $H_W_GOOD15%$COLOR_END$BRRecovers $H_W_GOOD1%$COLOR_END of total HP every second$BRIncreases skill damage by $H_W_GOOD20%$COLOR_END$BRPrevents crystals from breaking $H_W_GOOD1$COLOR_END time$BR Increases the drop rate when hunting monsters by $H_W_GOOD100%$COLOR_END (drop rate is influenced by the number of party members)$BRIncreases Movement Speed by $H_W_GOOD$value$COLOR_END

abnormality.name: Cooldown and MP Replenishment
abnormality.tooltip: Provides the following effects.$BR $BR Reduces the cooldown of all skills (excluding alliance skills) by $H_W_GOOD20%$COLOR_END$BR Recovers $H_W_GOOD5%$COLOR_END of total MP every second

abnormality.name: Movement Speed
abnormality.tooltip: Increases Movement Speed by $H_W_GOOD10$COLOR_END.

abnormality.name: Shape Change: Big Head
abnormality.tooltip: Your head is ginormous!

abnormality.name: Shape Change: Big Head
abnormality.tooltip: Your head is ginormous!
